mapper.select: select e.empno,ename,sex,nation,birthday,address, ismarry,tel,idnum,school,major,remarks,img,role,dname,cname from emp_jxd e left join dept_jxd d on e.deptno = d.deptno left join class c on e.class_num = c.cno where e.empno = #{empno}
select e.* from emp_jxd e left join class c on c.empno = e.empno where cno = #{class_num}
select e.*,cname from emp_jxd e left join class c on e.class_num = c.cNo where class_num = #{class_num}
